scene.title: 天命派

motion.img: 奥托-微笑自信-摊手-中景

dialog.p: [Allow me to start from the beginning: to the west of Shenzhou, there’s another continent called Europe.[\s]
You have different sects and houses in Shenzhou, while there’s only one in Europe, called Schicksal.]

motion.img: 奥托-微笑自信-单空手-中景

scene.dialog: [The Schicksal Sect was established by three families, it’s said that the patriarchs’ techniques are unmatched in this world.

Schicksal quickly became a force not to be underestimated in a few years, which later, they merged with the Hall of the Divine, the Palace of Heroes, and the School of the Briar Crown, increasing its power on the continent.]

[Schicksal is an overview of the European continent, hence affairs are complex and it would be too much to handle for one person. Thus Schicksal’s power is controlled by three families… three sects, and has been for a thousand years.]
[Wow, a thousand years!]
scene.text: Li Sushang was very surprised.
scene.dialog: [Tsk tsk, that’s truly amazing, few of our Six Great Sects have a thousand years’ worth of history! Is this Schicksal a sword sect, what kind of martial arts do they practice?]

motion.img: 奥托-笑容释然-标准-中景

scene.dialog: [There’s swordsmanship, also spearmanship; but the most unique techniques passed down by Schicksal, is what you call [Magic] and [Sorcery].]

motion.img: 奥托-微笑自信-单空手-中景

scene.text: The Raksha raised his left hand, inside was a golden cross.

motion.img: 奥托-微笑奸-单十字-中景

scene.dialog: [Based on your culture, it would be more appropriate to refer to it as a Magical Relic.]

cg.img: 氛围_通用_犹大誓约启动

text.p: The golden chains flashed. Li Sushang suddenly felt her body lose power as her internal strength dissipated.
After a short moment, everything went back to normal.

scene.text: She looked at the Raksha’s palm, the golden cross already dissipated, and became smoke.

motion.img: 素裳-疲惫无神-持剑-中景
奥托-微笑释然-标准-中景

scene.dialog: (Eh, this feels…)

dialog.p: [This is one of the three Magical Relics of Schicksal: [Oath of Judah];
it can seal away Honkai Energy— [Ki] Circulation.]
[And what I used to heal you last night, was another Magical Relic called [Abyss Flower];
it can heal the human body, regenerate bones and activate muscles. As long as there’s enough Ki, now matter how severe the injury is, it can be healed.]

scene.dialog: [But, two of the Magical Relics you’ve seen aren’t real, they’re both mimicries.]
scene.text: The Raksha then gently tapped his temple with his slender fingers.
scene.dialog: [In here, even Schicksal Sect doesn’t know its existence, it’s my unique Magical Relic— [Void Archives].]

[Everything I’ve seen, touched, and understood, Void Archives can [mimic] using Ki, and manifest into an entity. [\s]Because of this, I can replicate the power of the three Magical Relics of Schicksal.]

motion.img: 奥托-微笑自信-标准-中景

text.p: Li Sushang crossed her arms and tilted her head, then she bit her lips. [\s]
It wasn’t that she didn’t believe the Raksha’s words, but her brain had been turned to mush by a bunch of information.

scene.dialog: [...Hold on, hold on. That Schicksal Sect sounds fun, Magical Relics and what…]
scene.text: Sushang pouted in annoyance:
scene.dialog: [How did we suddenly talk about cultivation and relics? I know you’re very good and don’t explain in such details. So let’s talk about the Schicksal Sect then.]
[Mm.]
scene.text: The Raksha sighed, then looked at Sushang:

motion.img: 奥托-微笑自信-单空手-中景

scene.dialog: [Schicksal has a firm control over Europe, after a long time, its ambition swelled and finally focused on its vast neighbors. Twenty years ago, Schicksal sent troops to attack— err, visit Shenzhou, hoping to compete with Shenzhou— err, competition.]
[Your Shenzhou army was strong,
but Schicksal’s Valkyries— err, Wuxia were able to win the matches, using the help of their Magical Relics.]
scene.text: The Raksha stopped talking, rephrasing historical facts into a version that Li Sushang could understand was apparently tormenting him greatly.
The proof is— even in the scorching sun the Raksha has never sweated, yet at this moment there are already a few large beads of sweat slowly running down his delicate cheeks.
Sushang looked at his embarrassment on the side, very overjoyed.

motion.img: 奥托-微笑释然-标准-中景

scene.dialog: [Schicksal had victory close within its control, but then, the Celestial appeared.]
[That’s when I saw her…]

dialog.p: [What should I say of the Celestial…
With the wave of a hand, the heavens roared with thunder, the earth froze to ice, and flames ignited without wind.

scene.dialog: All sorts of strange sights crushed Schicksal’s formations. The Holy Knights stepped forward, but they couldn’t do anything.]
scene.text: The Raksha smiled bitterly, and his voice gradually floated farther away.

dialog.p: [Even the strongest Valkyrie… the genius who fully mastered the [Oath of Judah],
when in front of her, she was defeated…]

scene.text: The Raksha’s eyes involuntarily floated towards the coffin.

motion.img: 素裳-悲伤目前-抱手-中景

scene.text: Li Sushang paid attention to his gaze.[\s]After being with him for around a day, she noticed that although this Raksha man talked and laughed from time to time, but when he looked at that coffin, he would go into his world of solitude and loneliness.
scene.dialog: [What’s inside there?]
scene.text: Li Sushang had no interest in fighting but couldn’t help and ask.
scene.dialog: [You’re always speaking to it, is someone inside?]
[No…]
scene.text: The Raksha shook his head, he seemed confused. His eyes moved up to down the coffin, before looking at his palms again.
scene.dialog: [You don’t know? You’ve never opened it?]
scene.text: The Raksha didn’t answer her, his mind seemed to already fly to a place far away, leaving behind an empty husk besides Li Sushang
scene.dialog: [em italic]Sushang waited patiently. She held her chin, watched the Raksha staring into space with an empty gaze, wondering what he was thinking about.[/em]

text.p: Missing something thousands of miles away, how could she imagine what the old country in the Western Regions was like?

dialog.p: (... …Does he have a mom and a dad?
Aye, a stupid question, of course he does~[/em]
[em italic]He couldn’t have popped out of a rock.)
He probably does… Could he be married?[/em]

scene.text: Does he have a master? Is he a disciple of the Schicksal Sect?)
The little girl realized she knew nothing about this Raksha.

Although they traveled together for two days, the girl didn’t say any meaningful words to the Raksha, though she asked his name, but she gave up the memory once she heard strange sounds. No matter how hard she tried, she couldn’t remember anything.
scene.dialog: [em italic]（I need to talk with Raksha more...）[/em]
scene.text: Sushang became a little sad.

text.p: She suddenly remembered: once she takes this Raksha to see her master, they would have to separate.[\s]
There’s only half a day left to get along with him, not saying it was long; it was short, really short.

scene.dialog: [Aye… Can Master keep him around for a few more days?]
scene.text: For some reason, the girl felt even more disappointed.
She had friends for the first time in fifteen years, enjoying the joy of getting along with them, and experienced the pain of parting.
The night was long, the two people who couldn’t sleep sat side by side, and the gods didn’t guard their homes until daylight was bright.
